solution_line_template: Since the company was contracted to build {bollards_per_side} bollards on each side of a road, they were to install a total of {bollards_per_side}*{num_sides} = <<{bollards_per_side}*{num_sides}={total_bollards_required}>>{total_bollards_required} bollards on all sides of the road.

The company was only able to install {fraction_installed}*{total_bollards_required} = <<{fraction_installed}*{total_bollards_required}={bollards_installed}>>{bollards_installed} bollards on all sides of the road.

They required {total_bollards_required}-{bollards_installed} = <<{total_bollards_required}-{bollards_installed}={bollards_remaining_to_install}>>{bollards_remaining_to_install} more bollards to install on all sides of the remaining part of the road.
